name: Plum
description: Plum is a sharpening/blind deconvolution suite with certain advanced features like Non-Local error, Block Matching, etc..

functions.name: Super
functions.description: Optional, it helps improve the precision of sub-pixel motion estimation and compensation, use it and get a quality boost or don't and get a performance boost

functions.name: Basic
functions.description: The basic estimation performs sharpening with spatial self similarity to cancel out ringing, the sharpening kernel is not unsharpen masking, it's a blind deconvolution filter (assuming PSF is a circle).

functions.name: Final
functions.description: The final estimation adjusts the basic estimation using temporal self similarity to cancel out noise and residual aliasing.
